name: Ariadna's Bane
detailed_description:
Story

The action will take you to the distant future when a fragile peace between humans and an alien race will stand on the edge. As the only survivor from the crew you will have to discover the secret of the underground research facility on the planet Ariadna.

Key features (upcoming)


  • Roguelike elements
Thanks to the procedurally generated levels each game is different. The enemies you meet will have different statistics and abilities, which will force you to use different tactics.

  • Action RPG
Real time combat with tactics attitude. You will fight against alien races, mechanical bots and other humans characters. All of them controlled by advanced AI system.

  • Constant threat
Playing on Ironman/Permadeath mode causes adrenaline pump in tight situations.
